topic.title: Components of troubleshooting information
topic.shortdesc: Troubleshooting information has a standard pattern that includes sequential components: condition, cause, and remedy.

body.p: Troubleshooting components are defined in the following way:

dlentry.dd: A symptom, typically an undesirable state in a product, system, or service that a user wants to correct
The underlying cause for the undesirable state
The action that a user can perform to restore the product, system, or service to its normal state
